channel.title: My attention-seeking thread + Rant
channel.description:
First off, this could be seen as just another attention-seeking leaving thread, which would be slightly hypocritical as I'm always saying I hate those, however you would do better to view it as an objective opinion on the why the community is in such a state.
I'm out. I was going to have to stop trolling the IRC and reading the forums anyway soon due to real-life issues, but I've pushed it forwards a month or two, because you guys make me sick. With the exception of literally 3 or 4 people in the community, I can hand on heart say that you are all a bunch of kids. The reason the community is in such a state is because you _want_ it to be. Nothing more, nothing less.
Before anyone asks, no, this has not directly come from the IRC issues yesterday (although they contributed), I realised this some time ago - I stayed because I wanted to see things get back on track and felt that as an IRC ChanOp and Global Mod I was perhaps in even more of a position to guide things than most. However, all of the good intentions and privileges in the world are not going to help organise a community that simply does not want to be organised.
So, where do I think everything went wrong? I think you are looking for the wrong people. There are far too many preteens here, or at least, people who act like they are preteens. I have nothing against young people who perhaps do not have a skill to offer us yet, what I have a problem with is faghats who haven't yet learned how to be civil and social.
You constantly bitch about people asking stupid questions, yet when somebody asks an intelligent question, you instantly dismiss it as stupid because they don't know as much as you do, almighty veterans of the community. Nobody is born with knowledge on RS cheating - in my opinion, all our new members need is a willingness to learn and a lack of outward overinflated ego - if they fit this description, they should be helped as much as possible. Note: I did not say "fed with a silver spoon".
Anyways, I'm starting to ramble a bit now, but, adios and thanks for the good times. If anyone I don't have on MSN actually wants to continue to speak with me, feel free to add me - amentotheamen@hotmail.co.uk.

You’ll be back Mopman. Once you realize that we are the only ones you had, you will come crying back.

And fuck off with all your “GL ON LIFE”, Because I know Mopman cringes as much as me when he reads it.

item.title: My attention-seeking thread + Rant
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“N E A, post:39, topic:156044”]Wow , this is a great shock to me…
I’ve always knew Mopman as a great guy , even in IRC when some of the kids starts to flame/insult me , he’s the one who never flamed/insulted me about anything.
I was very happy to see Mopman getting the G-mod place in this community - thats when the time i thought this community is going to get cleaned of kids, yet, it hasn’t changed into anything better.
Not saying that its his fault , its just us(people who act like little kids).

I will always have some respect for you , Mopman , before you ever had your place in this community as a G-mod.
I admit that i was stupid and counted as a kid, although i believe everyone has acted like that once in their time being here.
Good luck with your life , i wish you get the best opportunities wherever you are.
For me , i have no idea why i stay visiting this site , when its for RS-cheating.
I end this by telling you how much i had respect and love for you Mopman , Good bye.

-Akisboy32[/quote]

Perhaps you have forgotten that you are one of the younger members of this community? Honestly akisboy, you have been banned numerous times for being an idiotic douche; leave already.

@ Mopman: have fun finding a job after you get kicked out.

Read full topic
